#Set the below parameters manually package_name="zabbix-server" published_version="3.4.7" #Check distro and available version in repo : rhel7.x, Sles11.x/12.x, Ub16.x/17.x . /etc/os-release if [ $ID == "rhel" ]; then available_version=$(sudo yum info $package_name | grep Version | head -1 | cut -d ':' -f 2| cut -d ' ' -f 2) elif [ $ID == "sles" ]; then available_version=$(sudo zypper info $package_name | grep Version | head -1 | cut -d ':' -f 2| cut -d ' ' -f 2) elif [ $ID == "ubuntu" ]; then available_version=$(sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-cache policy $package_name | grep Candidate | head -1 | cut -d ' ' -f 4) fi if [[ $available_version == *"$published_version"* ]]; then echo "Version $published_version is already available in repo" echo "Exact name: $available_version ... Failing" exit 1 else echo "Published version is not available in repo. Going ahead." fi #------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- export SHELL=/bin/bash echo $SHELL export WORK_DIR=`pwd` cd $WORK_DIR sudo apt-get -y update export DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive sudo -E apt-get install -y mysql-server sudo DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive apt-get -y install wget curl vim gcc make snmp snmptrapd ceph libmysqld-dev libmysqlclient-dev libxml2-dev libsnmp-dev libcurl4 libcurl4-openssl-dev git apache2 php php-mysql libapache2-mod-php php7.2-xml php7.2-gd php-bcmath php-mbstring php7.2-ldap libevent-dev libpcre3-dev sudo chmod 777 /etc/timezone sudo echo -e "Asia/Kolkata" >> /etc/timezone sudo chmod 766 /etc/apache2/apache2.conf cd /etc/apache2 sudo cp apache2.conf apache2.conf.old sudo echo -e "ServerName localhost" >> /etc/apache2/apache2.conf sudo echo -e "AddType application/x-httpd-php .php" >> /etc/apache2/apache2.conf sudo echo -e "" >> /etc/apache2/apache2.conf sudo echo -e " DirectoryIndex index.php " >> /etc/apache2/apache2.conf sudo echo -e "" >> /etc/apache2/apache2.conf diff -u apache2.conf.old apache2.conf || true cd $WORK_DIR sudo rm -rf zabbix mkdir zabbix cd zabbix wget http://sourceforge.net/projects/zabbix/files/ZABBIX%20Latest%20Stable/3.4.7/zabbix-3.4.7.tar.gz/download -O zabbix-3.4.7.tar.gz tar -xvf zabbix-3.4.7.tar.gz cd zabbix-3.4.7 ./configure --enable-server --with-mysql --enable-ipv6 --with-net-snmp --with-libcurl --with-libxml2 make sudo make install sudo rm -rf /var/www/html/zabbix/ sudo mkdir -p /var/www/html/zabbix/ cd $WORK_DIR/zabbix/zabbix-3.4.7/frontends/php/ sudo cp -rf * /var/www/html/zabbix/ sudo groupadd zabbix | echo "group already exist" sudo useradd -g zabbix zabbix | echo "user already exist" cd /var/www/html/zabbix sudo chown -R zabbix:zabbix conf sudo service apache2 start sleep 30s sudo service mysql start sleep 30s sudo /usr/bin/mysql -e "create database zabbix" sudo /usr/bin/mysql -e "create user 'zabbix'@'localhost'" sudo /usr/bin/mysql -e "grant all privileges on zabbix.* to 'zabbix'@'localhost' " cd $WORK_DIR/zabbix/zabbix-3.4.7/database/mysql mysql -uzabbix zabbix < schema.sql mysql -uzabbix zabbix < images.sql mysql -uzabbix zabbix < data.sql filename=/etc/php/7.2/apache2/php.ini cp $filename $HOME/bkup sudo -E sed -i 's/max_execution_time = 30/max_execution_time = 300/g' $filename sudo -E sed -i 's/max_input_time = 60/max_input_time = 300/g' $filename sudo -E sed -i 's/post_max_size = 8M/post_max_size = 16M/g' $filename sudo -E sed -i "s/;date.timezone =/date.timezone = 'Asia\/Kolkata'/g" $filename diff -u $HOME/bkup $filename || true zabbix_server sudo service apache2 restart #Check if Zabbix server successfully started.
